proposed_strategy.name: Single Prashna Chunk
proposed_strategy.description: The document contains only the first Prashna of the Prashnopanishat. Since the entire text is short and adheres to the character limit, it is processed as a single chunk.

execution_plan.description: Complete First Prashna (Mantra 1 through 16) and associated commentary.

parsing_instructions.justification: The document structure centers around the numerically defined Mantras (1-16). Each segment of the primary text is clearly delimited by its sequential number, followed immediately by the commentary (Prakashika).

start_pattern.description: The beginning of a new thematic section, often preceding the Mantra text itself, marked by double asterisks and bracketed Devanagari headings.

end_pattern.description: The end of the primary Mantra text, marked by a double danda enclosing the sequential number.

parsing_instructions.pre_content_handling: The initial section defining the Prashna, the main commentary heading ('प्रकाशिका'), and the 'मङ्गलाचरणम्' should be treated as prefatory material before the content of the first numbered Mantra begins.
